title: Multiple admin support
description: Support multiple admin users with full access (Fred and Elsy), not just single admin.

title: PWA + web push infrastructure
description: Make app installable on iPhone home screen. Add web push notification support and backend capability to send pushes (infrastructure only).

title: Meal Plans - fix saving, improve UX, default to today
description:
**Bugs/Issues:**
1. Saving meal plans not working - adding one doesn't persist
2. Need to clarify meal plans are household-level (for all kids), not per-kid
3. Should default to today's date when opening the page

**Requirements:**
1. Fix save functionality - debug API call and ensure data persists
2. Make it clear in UI that meal plans are for the household (all kids)
3. Auto-select today's date on page load
4. Good UX for planning meals for the week

**Check:**
- MealPlan model in schema: date, mealType, description, recipe, notes
- API endpoints in apps/api/src/meal-plans/
- Frontend form submission and API call

title: Admin panel - manage user PINs and login credentials
description:
**Missing functionality:**
As an admin, there's no way to:
1. Change/reset PIN for staff users
2. Change/reset passwords for users
3. Manage user accounts (edit, deactivate)

**Requirements:**
1. Admin section should have User Management page
2. List all users with their roles
3. For each user, admin can:
   - Reset/change their PIN
   - Reset/change their password
   - Edit their profile (name, email, role)
   - Deactivate/delete account
4. Maybe add 'Create New User' functionality

**API may already exist:**
- Check for /api/users endpoints
- Check for reset-pin, reset-password endpoints
- Need to wire up frontend to these APIs

title: Inventory UX - add/remove items, unit selection, direct quantity editing
description:
**Current issues:**
- Can't easily add new inventory items
- Can't remove/delete inventory items
- Can't change unit type (grams, packs, bottles, etc.) when adding/editing
- Quantity only has +/- buttons, can't directly type and save a number

**Requirements:**
1. Add 'New Item' button to create inventory items
2. Add delete/remove option for items
3. Unit selector dropdown in add/edit form (grams, kg, packs, bottles, pieces, liters, ml, etc.)
4. Quantity field should be editable - user can type a number directly and save
5. Keep +/- buttons as quick adjust, but allow direct input too

**UX:**
- Add floating '+ Add Item' button or top bar button
- Each item should have edit/delete options (maybe swipe or menu)
- In edit mode: show text input for quantity with +/- on sides
- Unit dropdown pulling from AppConfig (check schema for unit configs)

title: Kids section - show all events on main page, not per-kid drill-down
description:
**Current UX:**
- Have to open each kid individually to see their events/activities
- Not efficient for getting a quick overview

**Desired UX:**
- Main Kids page shows ALL events/activities across all kids
- Display as a timeline or list sorted by date/time
- Each event shows which kid it's for
- Can still drill into specific kid for detailed view

**Benefits:**
- Quick overview of all kids' schedules at a glance
- Better for planning (see everything in one place)
- Parents can see 'what's happening today/this week' immediately

**Implementation:**
- Aggregate KidSchedule entries from all kids
- Sort by date/time
- Show kid name as badge/tag on each event
- Keep individual kid pages as detail views

title: Kids section - activities showing count but no data when opened
description:
**Bug:**
- Kids section shows '6 activities scheduled' (or similar count)
- But when opening the detail view, no activities are displayed
- Likely a missing API call or data not wired to the component

**To investigate:**
1. Check Kids page/component data fetching
2. Verify API endpoint for kid activities is being called
3. Ensure response data is properly mapped to UI
4. Check KidSchedule or KidActivityLog in schema for correct data source

title: Responsive desktop/tablet UI
description: Make all sections responsive for desktop and tablet, not just mobile. The app should work well on all screen sizes.

title: Meal plan calendar view
description: Add meal planning view with calendar-style table to plan kids meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks) across days.

title: Optimistic UI updates
description: When updating inventory and other items, update instantly on frontend without full list refresh. Backend syncs silently in background.

title: Admin configurability
description: Make all data admin-configurable (not hardcoded): inventory items, to-do lists, activities, and custom units with selectable defaults.

title: Shopping UX overhaul - list visibility, styling, and collaboration
description:
**Current issues:**
- Can't see all shopping lists
- 'grocery' label showing lowercase (should be properly capitalized)
- Overall UX not great for collaboration

**Requirements:**
1. Show all shopping lists with easy switching between them
2. Proper capitalization/styling for list names
3. Best-in-class shopping list UX for household collaboration

**UX Research needed:**
- Look at best shopping list apps (AnyList, OurGroceries, Bring!)
- Key features: easy add items, check off items, real-time sync feel, categorize items, assign to person
- Clean, mobile-friendly design
- Quick add (just type and enter)
- Swipe to check off or delete
- Maybe group items by category/aisle

**Collaboration features:**
- See who added what
- Assign list to a person (driver/shopper)
- Status: active, completed, archived

title: Fix missing i18n translations in sidebar
description: nav.mealPlans and nav.admin showing as raw i18n keys instead of translated text in the sidebar navigation. Need to add the missing translation entries.

title: Admin user management
description: Admin panel to manage: 1) PIN codes for staff 2) Username/password for admins (Fred and Elsy)

title: Kids meal - make image upload optional
description:
**Bug:**
When adding a meal for a kid, the image upload field is required.

**Fix:**
Make the image/photo field optional - not every meal needs a photo.

**Check:**
- Frontend form validation (remove required)
- API/backend validation (ensure photo field is nullable)
- Schema already has photo as optional (String?)

title: Improve Tasks UX - per-person views, scheduling, and recurring tasks
description:
Current tasks view shows all tasks in a flat list. Need better UX:

**Requirements:**
1. Filter/view tasks by assignee (per-person view)
2. Ability to schedule tasks for future dates
3. Calendar or timeline view to see upcoming tasks
4. Recurring/repetitive task support (daily, weekly, monthly, custom)

**UX Recommendations:**
- Add assignee filter dropdown or tabs at top (All | By Person: [dropdown])
- Add date range filter (Today | This Week | This Month | All)
- Show task due dates more prominently
- For recurring tasks: add repeat options in task create/edit form (None, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Custom)
- Consider a mini calendar view or timeline for visual scheduling
- Staff members should see 'My Tasks' by default

**Backend:** Recurring task model may already exist (check schema for 'recurring' field on Task)
